Sentencas: This work investigates the performance of solid oxide cells as fuel cells (SOFCs) for power production and also as electrolysis cells (SOECs) for hydrogen production.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: In order to deliver this dual mode flexible operation system, a novel perovskite oxide based on Ga3+ doped SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-delta (SCFG) is synthesized via a sol gel method.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Its performance for oxygen electrode catalyst was then evaluated.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Single solid oxide cell in the configuration of Ni-YSZ vertical bar YSZ vertical bar GDC vertical bar SCFG is assembled and tested in SOFC or SOEC modes from 550 to 850 degrees C with hydrogen as the fuel or as the product, respectively.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: GDC is used to avoid the reaction between the electrolyte YSZ and the cobalt-based electrode.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Under SOFC mode, a maximum power density of 1044 mW cm(-2) is obtained at 750 degrees C. Further, the cell delivers a stable power output of 650 mW cm(-2) up to 125 hat 0.7 V.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: In the electrolysis mode, when the applied voltage is controlled at 2 V, the electrolysis current density reaches 3.33 A cm(-2) at 850 degrees C with the hydrogen production rate up to 22.9 mL min(-1) cm(-2) (STP).
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: These results reveal that SCFG is a very promising oxygen electrode material for application in both SOFC and SOEC.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production
Novel solid oxide cells with SrCo0.8Fe0.1Ga0.1O3-δ oxygen electrode for flexible power generation and hydrogen production
